title: France Sees Reasons for Caution on Bolstering Euro’s Global Role
description: The French government is getting cold feet about Europe seeking to strengthen the international role of the euro and calling for an assessment of the economic risks.
content: The French government is getting cold feet about Europe seeking to strengthen the international role of the euro and calling for an assessment of the economic risks.
